cast.overview: Toronto Maple Leafs owner Harold Ballard -- Canada's greatest showman - He didn't invent greed. He perfected it.
cast.title: Offside: The Harold Ballard Story

cast.overview: The Memorial Cup is considered the most difficult trophy in hockey to win. Hear the stories of some of the greatest junior hockey teams in history as they persevered through tragedy and adversity to add their names to the magnificent Memorial Cup.
cast.title: Memorial Cup Memories

cast.overview: An adolescent lion is accidentally shipped from the New York Zoo to Africa. Now running free, his zoo pals must put aside their differences to help bring him back.
cast.title: The Wild

cast.overview: Hockey Night in Canada and I have teamed up again to bring you the best NHL action ever. Hard Hits, Great Goals, Super Saves and the Craziest Bloopers make for over 70 minutes of the best highlights from the greatest sport on earth. We also take a look back at the '07 playoffs including Ottawa's and Anaheims's march to the Stanley Cup Final. Ya got all the NHL superstars. Coaches Corner and Grapes - what else do ya need?
cast.title: Don Cherry 19

cast.overview: For 20 years Blue and Grapes have been bringing hard hitting hockey. Blue thinks this year is the best. They have all the best plays from the NHL, the great saves, goals, hits, bloopers and of course a tussle or two. They also take a look back at the 2008 Staley Cup Playoffs, and don't forget they have the best of this years Coaches Corner too! Over one hour of the best NHL action. What else can you ask for?
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 20

cast.overview: CBC's Hockey Night in Canada presents Don Cherry 18, the best hockey DVD of all-time. Over 91 Minutes of the best hockey action from the 2005/2006 regular season and the playoffs. Don Cherry 18 has the best hits, goals, saves and bloopers from the fastest sport on earth. As a bonus, also included are Coach's Corner highlights. Relive one of the best playoffs in Stanley Cup history including the Oilers and Hurricanes magic run to the finals. It's all action and no filler.
cast.title: Don Cherry 18

cast.overview: Who's the hardest hitter in the NHL? Who's The Best Goalie of all time? On Don Cherry 17 The Best of the Best, Grapes gives his opinion on these questions and more. Along with the best goals, saves, bloopers and hits from the 50's to today, Don Cherry 17 The Best of the Best looks back at some of the NHL's best playoff goals and 7th game overtime winning goals. Don Cherry 17 The Best of the Best is loaded with over 70 minutes of non stop action with many rare highlights available to the public for the first time. No hockey fan should be without Don Cherry 17, The Best of the Best.
cast.title: Don Cherry 17

cast.overview: CBC's Hockey Night In Canada presents Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 22! This year, Don's got all the great goals, hits, saves and bloopers from the 2009-2010 NHL Season PLUS Don takes a look back at the surprising Stanley Cup win by Chicago. All That and the best of last year's Coach's Corner. As Don says "you're gonna love it!"
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 22

cast.overview: A boy begrudgingly buys second hand skates which turn out to make him the best hockey player ever - via three wishes.
cast.title: The Magic Hockey Skates

cast.overview: A Polar Bear tries to teach her two cubs about life in the Arctic and the new challenges they face due to the interference of man.  The Great Polar Adventure takes audiences inside the secret life of polar bears and imagines life from their perspective. Ikuk, a new polar bear mother, faces tremendous challenges as she raises cubs for the first time. With the rise of global warming, she must lead her family into dangerous "two-leg" territory to scavenge for food.
cast.title: The Great Polar Bear Adventure

cast.original_title: Orchestrating An Upset: The 1996 World Cup of Hockey
cast.overview: Orchestrating an Upset is relatively recent history, but it is one of the United State’s rare international wins in best-on-best play and it hasn’t gotten nearly the same treatment the Miracle has. How did they assemble a team to beat Canada, who had previously won 4/5 Canada Cup tournaments? The documentary itself is a fun look back at a tournament that had a ton of drama despite not getting much in the way of publicity, especially in the United States. The movie covers Team USA’s creation and all of the international background going into the World Cup. The US was 0-7 against Canada in previous Canada Cup tournaments and hadn’t beaten their northern rivals in 20 years. A first shift brawl in a round robin game against Canada foreshadowed how the Americans would play for the rest of the tournament.
cast.title: Orchestrating An Upset: The 1996 World Cup of Hockey

cast.original_title: The Passion Returns - The '92-'93 Toronto Maple Leafs
cast.overview: The Passion Returns is a tribute to the '92-'93 Toronto Maple Leafs. This proud group restored dignity and tradition to the blue and white sweater during an unforgettable springtime journey. This is a look back over the 1992-93 Toronto Maple Leafs season including the playoffs where they came within a game of the Stanley Cup final. Highlights, and Interviews with players, management, and media.
cast.title: The Passion Returns - The '92-'93 Toronto Maple Leafs

cast.overview: "Hey folks, what can I say, I did it again. Just the way I like, over 1 hour of the greatest NHL action, with no fillers.  Only the best NHL hits, saves, goals, bloopers and more. Blue also added all the great playoff action, including Calgary's march to the finals. Music tracks by The Trews, Reef U.K. and MC Mario.  Don Cherry 16 - It's like me, getting better every year."
cast.title: Don Cherry 16

cast.overview: The 2008-09 NHL season was a beauty! You got veterans setting records and rookies burning up the league. Blue has done it again with all the great action - saves goals bloopers hits the odd tussle and, of course, Coach's Corner. We take a look at the 2009 Stanley Cup playoffs as the grinders come through and help Pittsburgh win the Cup. Hey, it's 21 years and counting. Rock 'em Sock 'em 21 - you're gonna love it!
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 21

cast.overview: If you love great hockey action, then Don Cherry's Rock' em Sock' em 23 is a must for your DVD collection. All the best NHL 2010/11 highlights from the greatest saves, hits, goals and bloopers are all here on one DVD. Don also takes a look back at the 2011 Stanley Cup Playoffs, including Boston's seven game victory over Vancouver. We also included the best of Coach's Corner and more. Rock' em Sock' em 23 - it just keeps getting better.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 23

cast.overview: Highlights from the 1998-99 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. Here it is folks, the greatest hockey tape of this millennium. Blue and I have picked the best hits, goals, saves, bloopers and more. Plus, all the best highlights from the NHL last season. Everything from overtime goals, to crunches behind the net, and of course Coach's Corner. As a bonus I'm going to give you parents some advise on getting your budding NHL'ers to the next level in minor hockey. Almost one hour of non-stop action. Blue says 'you're going to love it!'
cast.title: Don Cherry 11: The New Millenium

cast.overview: Highlights from the 1995-96 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. Hi folks, you're going to love ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 8. My son Tim and I have screened hundreds of games to bring you the very best goals, hits, saves & bloopers, and my pick of the best Coaches Corner, plus some of my great openings of the games for Hockey Night In Canada. This year as a bonus I will have a few tips on how to run a practice for the coaches and some advice for the Players. Who could ask for anything more? No wonder ROCK' EM SOCK' EMS are the biggest selling tapes of all time. ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 8 you're gonna love it!
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 8

cast.overview: Highlights from the 1996-97 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. 1.2 million and counting. ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 9 is the newest edition to the best selling sports video series in the world. Blue and I have sat down and watched over 200 hours of highlights to bring you the best action you've seen. You're gonna love all the hits, saves, goals, great plays and, or course, the odd tussle. Naturally, we have Coach's Corner highlights and the best bloopers. AS A BONUS, I'm going to answer all the questions you hockey parents have asked me over the years. Blue says, 'ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 9 is the best hockey video yet!' I say you're going to love it.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 9

cast.overview: Highlights from the 1991-92 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. 46 minutes of the best hockey action. All the super hits, goals and saves of the season and playoffs. Bobby Probert and buddies drop in for a visit, plus Blue's Bloopers, and the 'Do's' and 'Don'ts' of hockey with Grapes' play book. Learn to speak hockey language with Grapes' Dictionary!! Last but not least, a few highlights from Coach's Corner. ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 4, you're going to love it!! It's a beauty!!
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 4

cast.overview: Highlights from the 1993-94 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. Well here it is folks, what you've been waiting for - No. 6 in the series of my Rock' em Sock' em Videos (which are, by the way, the biggest selling hockey videos ever). And why wouldn't they be... they're the best of all time. We screen over 300 games to pick out the best stuff: SWEET GOALS, BEAUTY HITS, DYNAMITE SAVES. Marty & Probie drop in for a visit (and have a slight disagreement!). Of course there's Coach's Corner, Bloopers and a new feature: my tips on safety for young players. Over 1 hour of the best Rock' em Sock' em yet! They've all been great. But I think this one's the best.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock 'em Sock 'em Hockey 6

cast.original_title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey Volume 1
cast.overview: Highlights from the 1988-89 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. Don has put together the best action in hockey; hits galore, great saves, the best goals scored, plus all those funny things that happen during games. This is hockey the way 'Grapes' loves it; full of action, fun and fire!!!
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey Volume 1

cast.original_title: Don Cherry's All New Rock'em Sock'em Hockey
cast.overview: Highlights from the 1990-91 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry.
cast.title: Don Cherry's All New Rock'em Sock'em Hockey

cast.overview: Here it is folks, Don Cherry's Lucky 13. Blue's so excited about this DVD, she bites me right on the neck. And why shouldn't she be excited, we have the best NHL action of any DVD around. We have the best hits, saves, goals, bloopers and more. I also give some advice to parents and coaches for young hockey players. Blue thinks this is the best DVD yet! You're gonna love it. P.S. I'm not kidding about Blue biting me, it's on the DVD.
cast.title: Don Cherry: Lucky 13

cast.overview: 'If you liked ROCK' EM SOCK' EM HOCKEY, your gonna love ROCK' EM SOCK' EM HOCKEY VOLUME II; great hits, goals, bloopers and much, much more. We even have a few Coach's Corner highlights, and wait till you hear 'Grapejam'.  This is hockey the way I like it - Full of fun, Fire and Action!'
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Volume 2

cast.overview: Here it is folks, Don Cherry 12, and Blue and I think this one is the best. This year I'm going to answer some of the mail I get from you the fans. Of course we have the best hits, saves, goals, and more from last year's regular season and playoffs. As a special bonus, we'll take a look back at some of my old Grapevine shows. Hey, my hockey tapes are the best tapes in the world, over 2,000,000 hockey fans can't be wrong.
cast.title: Don Cherry 12

cast.overview: Here it is folks, for the first time in Blu-ray - or should I say 'Blue Ray' - Rock' em Sock' em 24. The best hits, saves, goals, bloopers and more from the 2011-2012 NHL Season in true hi-def! We take a look back at the hardest fought playoffs in memory and the LA King's run to their first Stanley Cup Championship. Of course we have the best of Coach's Corner and I show off my musical talent. Get ready for the best Rock' em Sock' em yet. Ya ready, let's go!
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 24

cast.overview: Here we have it folks, my tape of the BEST HITS, BEST GOALS, BEST SAVES, BEST BLOOPERS and all the rest of the action from last year in the NHL. Hey, what would my tape be without the odd disagreement. For a bonus, I'm going to pick my favourite goals, saves, hits, and my favourite disagreement of the past 10 years in the NHL. Blue and I know you're going to love this one!
cast.title: Don Cherry 10th Anniversary

cast.overview: 15 years and still going strong. Hey Blue and I have brought you the best of the NHL. All the great plays, hits, goals, saves, bloopers and with the odd tussle thrown in. Blue takes a look back at some of the great plays and upsets in the playoffs. Over 70 MINUTES of non stop NHL action. Also included are trivia game and BONUS FOOTAGE! It's a beauty!
cast.title: Don Cherry #15

cast.overview: Highlights from the 1994-95 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 7 - the best selling sports tape in the world - and why wouldn't it be? We go over 400 games to get the best goals, saves, hits, bloopers, the odd tussle, and naturally COACHES CORNER highlights. Last year we featured safety tips - this year in ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 7 we feature 'How to buy hockey equipment that fits properly', a must for younger players. ROCK' EM SOCK' EM 7, the very best.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 7

cast.overview: Hey folks, hard to believe it's been 25 years since the first Rock'em Sock'em Hockey hit the stores at Christmas. Rock'em Sock'em 25 is jam packed with all the NHL action you can handle. Blue has collected all the great saves, hits, goals, bloopers and more. Of course we take a look at one of the craziest and exciting playoffs in NHL history. Blue and I just want to thank all the faithful fans who have enjoyed Rock'em Sock'em over the last quarter century. They made it the most successful Canadian video series of all time, and for that Blue and I say Thank You.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 25

cast.overview: Here it is folks my new DVD, Don Cherry 14, over ONE hour of the greatest NHL action available to the public. From saves, to goals, playoff highlights and more. Blue says, Don Cherry 14 need we say more?
cast.title: Don Cherry #14

cast.overview: Highlights from the 1992-93 NHL season. Narrated by Don Cherry. Over an hour of best GOALS, HITS, SAVES, and BLOOPERS. You'll see such favorites as Wendel Clarke, Eric Lindros, Doug Gilmour and many more. My good buddies Tie Domi and the star of the ROCK' EM SOCK' EM series Bob Probert drop in for a visit (if you know what I mean), and I'll show you all the Montreal overtime goals as they marched to the Stanley Cup. Needless to say, COACH'S CORNER will be spotlighted. All this action is set to the sounds of Techno stars BKS and 2 Unlimited, and wait till you hear me in ROCK' EM SOCK' EM TECHNO! GOALS, SAVES, HITS, the odd TUSSLE...who could ask for more?
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 5

cast.overview: During the past half century, the Crawford family name has become synonymous with championships. They have their name on more hockey championship trophies than any other family in hockey history. The Memorial Cup, Robertson Cup, Turner Cup, Stanley Cup, Allen Cup, Sutherland Cup and Calder Cup. These trophies symbolize hockey champions at virtually every level of the game across North America.
cast.title: Crawford: Family of Champions

cast.overview: They call him "the Great One" and this is the first time ever he has told the many stories behind his greatest accomplishments and moments. Hosted by hockey personality John Davidson and Wayne's good friend, Keifer Sutherland, sports fans take a journey into the man that is Wayne Gretzky.
cast.title: Ultimate Gretzky

cast.overview: Legendary "Hockey Night in Canada" personality Don Cherry presents an action-packed roundup of blazing NHL action from the 2008-09 season. With his trademark wisecracking style, Don covers it all, from the regular season through the playoffs. In addition to highlights of the Stanley Cup battle between Pittsburgh and Detroit, Cherry brings you bloopers, stunning saves, heroic goals and the best of his popular "Coach's Corner" segment.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Hard-Hitting Hockey 3

cast.original_title: Soul on Ice: Past, Present and Future
cast.overview: Soul On Ice: Past, Present, and Future is a film that presents and retells the unknown contributions of black athletes in ice hockey. For untold decades, hockey was seen as a homogeneous sport, exciting to watch but played by one kind of player. But people deserve to now know of the exploits of athletes who dared to stand out, and dared to make the sport their own. These Black athletes dared to give their sport soul.
cast.title: Soul on Ice: Past, Present and Future

cast.overview: Hockey's most outrageous and controversial personality, former Boston Bruins coach Don Cherry, unleashes his 29th edition. Shot at the Original Hockey Hall of Fame in Don's hometown of Kingston, Ontario, hockey fans are going to love seeing the original equipment for the great Montreal Canadien Howie Morenz (who died of a broken heart after he couldn’t play hockey any more after a broken leg), one of the oldest hockey sticks in the world, the first hockey puck which is a lacrosse ball cut square so it would slide on the ice, and much more.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock 'em Sock 'em Hockey 29

cast.overview: Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey was released in 1989 and quickly became a huge success in the marketplace, subsequently becoming the best-selling sports video franchise in Canadian history. To date, the franchise has sold over two million units and continues to be one of the highest selling sports videos during the holiday season. In this 28th edition, hockey's most outrageous and controversial personality, former Boston Bruins coach Don Cherry covers the 2015-2016 NHL season's best plays, goals, saves, bloopers and hits, as well as highlights from Coach's Corner, and a recap of the year's Stanley Cup Playoffs.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock 'em Sock 'em Hockey 28

cast.overview: Hockey's most outrageous and controversial personality, former Boston Bruins coach Don Cherry, unleashes his 27th edition. Don Cherry's Rock'em Sock'em Hockey 27 includes the NHL season's best plays, goals, saves, bloopers and hits, as well as highlights from Coach's Corner, and a recap of the year's Stanley Cup Playoffs.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock 'em Sock 'em Hockey 27

cast.overview: Number 30 will be the last.  “I will miss doing it. I loved working with Tim on it for all these years. The only time I was happier was when I used to go see him play hockey,” said Don. “I want to thank all of the fans supporting it and the players who are in the videos too. A lot of them are grandfathers now in their 50s themselves.”
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock 'em Sock 'em Hockey 30

cast.overview: Hockey’s most outrageous and controversial personality, former Boston Bruins coach Don Cherry, unleashes his 26th edition. Don Cherry’s Rock’em Sock’em Hockey 26 includes the NHL season’s best plays, goals, saves, bloopers, and hits, as well as highlights from Coach’s Corner, and a recap of the year’s Stanley Cup Playoffs.
cast.title: Don Cherry's Rock 'em Sock 'em Hockey 26

cast.overview: Anything can turn spooky in this horror anthology series based on the best-selling books by master of kid horror, R.L. Stine. In every episode, see what happens when regular kids find themselves in scary situations, and how they work to confront and overcome their fears.
cast.name: Goosebumps

cast.overview: Zeroman is a Canadian animated television series that aired on the Canadian cartoon network Teletoon and on Télétoon. It tells the adventures of incompetent sixty-six-year-old postman Les Mutton who also happens to be the superhero known as Zeroman. As Zeroman, Les fights the crime that plagues Fair City in a similar fashion to Nielsen's Lieutenant Frank Drebin character in the Naked Gun series. Although a second season was once announced as in production, the death of Leslie Nielsen guaranteed that another season will not happen.
cast.name: Zeroman

cast.overview:
Kraft Hockeyville is an annual competition developed by CBC Sports and sponsored by Kraft Foods, the NHL and the NHL Players' Association in which communities across Canada compete to demonstrate their commitment to the sport of ice hockey.

The competition was first held in 2006 as a reality television series aired by CBC Television, but since 2007, it was relegated to segments aired during CBC's Saturday night NHL coverage, Hockey Night in Canada.
cast.name: Kraft Hockeyville

cast.overview: In this series of cartoon shorts, Mickey Mouse finds himself in silly situations all around the world! From New York to Paris to Tokyo, Mickey experiences new adventures with his friends!
cast.name: Mickey Mouse

crew.overview: Hockey Night in Canada and I have teamed up again to bring you the best NHL action ever. Hard Hits, Great Goals, Super Saves and the Craziest Bloopers make for over 70 minutes of the best highlights from the greatest sport on earth. We also take a look back at the '07 playoffs including Ottawa's and Anaheims's march to the Stanley Cup Final. Ya got all the NHL superstars. Coaches Corner and Grapes - what else do ya need?
crew.title: Don Cherry 19

crew.overview: Here it is folks, Don Cherry 12, and Blue and I think this one is the best. This year I'm going to answer some of the mail I get from you the fans. Of course we have the best hits, saves, goals, and more from last year's regular season and playoffs. As a special bonus, we'll take a look back at some of my old Grapevine shows. Hey, my hockey tapes are the best tapes in the world, over 2,000,000 hockey fans can't be wrong.
